item.title: Unlocking Edge ML: From PyTorch to Edge Deployment
item.description: info This blog post is still a work in progress. If you require further clarifications before the contents are finalized, please get in touch with me here, on LinkedIn, or Twitter. üöÄ Motivation - Edge Deployment It’s 2024, everyone seems to be talking about complex and larger models. Sophisticated models perform well at specific tasks. But they come with the cost of massive computational power. Typically that’s available in cloud-based environments.

item.title: Supercharge Your TIMM Models: 84x Faster Inference with ONNX Runtime Optimization
item.description: üöÄ Motivation Real time inference speed is crucial for many applications in production. Some could mean life or death. üíÄ Imagine you’re behind the wheels of a self-driving car and the car takes 1 second to detect an oncoming truck. Just one second too late… ‚è∞ And you could end up somewhere heavenly… üëºüëºüëº I hope that shows you how crucial this problem is. Today (2024), ML models are being deployed in all kinds of high-stakes industries like healthcare, finance, and self-driving cars.
